channel.title: aws on msdundar
channel.description: Recent content in aws on msdundar

item.title: Canary Lambda Deployments
item.description: Lambdas aren’t easy. This isn’t just a provocative start, but instead my overall experience planning, creating, and deploying them. Let’s be honest, making something up and running requires plenty of AWS knowledge. One might get lost easily even inside IAM alone. IAM groups, IAM users, IAM roles, IAM group policy attachments, IAM policy documents, IAM role policies - and how they connect is confusing enough considering what Lambda promises, simplicity. And this is just IAM.
